title: iOS Developer
jobDescription:
Â 
Job Description - iOS Senior Associate & Team Lead
Technical Skills:
Proficient in iOS development using Objective-C and Swift programming languages
Extensive knowledge of iOS frameworks such as UIKit, Core Graphics, and Core Animation
Experience in working with RESTful APIs and handling JSON data
Familiarity with version control systems, preferably Git
Strong understanding of iOS design patterns and architectural principles
Ability to optimize and debug iOS applications for enhanced performance and memory usage
Professional Experience:
iOS Senior Associate & Team Lead
Minimum of 6-8 years of hands-on experience in iOS development or related roles
Proven ability to lead teams, assign tasks, and ensure timely project delivery
Strong problem-solving skills to address complex technical challenges
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills for effective collaboration with team members and stakeholders
Education:
Graduate degree in a relevant field or equivalent industry experience
Additional certifications in iOS development or related areas would be advantageous
Your proficiency in Objective-C and Swift programming languages, along with your deep knowledge of iOS frameworks, will enable you to develop and launch exceptional iOS applications. Your ability to work with RESTful APIs and handle JSON data will enhance the integration of backend services, ensuring seamless functionality.
Your leadership skills will be invaluable in leading and coordinating teams of developers, ensuring the timely delivery of high-quality iOS solutions. Your problem-solving abilities, effective communication, and collaboration with cross-functional teams will drive project success.

standards

interface guidelines

title: Head Human Resource
tagsAndSkills: Human Resource Management,HR Operations,Performance Management,Talent Acquisition,Team Management,Payroll Management,Strategic HR,Employee Engagement
jobDescription:
Role & responsibilities


The Head of Human Resources will lead the HR department, ensuring the effective implementation of HR strategies, policies, and programs that align with the company's goals and objectives. This role requires a strategic thinker with a deep understanding of HR practices and a strong ability to foster a positive organizational culture.This role requires a strategic thinker with a deep understanding of HR practices and a strong ability to foster a positive organizational culture and drive cultural change within the organization.

Key Responsibilities


Strategic HR Management
Develop and implement HR strategies and initiatives aligned with the overall business strategy.
Provide strategic HR leadership and guidance to senior management and employees.
Talent Acquisition and Management
Oversee the recruitment and selection process to ensure the acquisition of top talent.
Develop and implement talent management and succession planning strategies.
Foster a culture of continuous learning and professional development.
Employee Relations
Manage and resolve complex employee relations issues.
Promote a positive work environment and culture.
Implement employee engagement and retention initiatives.
Performance Management
Design and implement performance management systems.
Ensure regular performance reviews and feedback mechanisms are in place.
Develop and implement reward and recognition programs.
Compliance and Policies
Ensure compliance with labor laws and regulations.
Develop, implement, and maintain HR policies and procedures.
Handle disciplinary actions and grievances in accordance with company policy.
Compensation and Benefits
Develop and manage competitive compensation and benefits programs.
Conduct regular benchmarking and reviews of compensation and benefits packages.
HR Operations
Oversee HR operations, including payroll, HRIS, and administrative functions.
Ensure accurate and timely reporting of HR metrics and analytics.

Job Location - Chembur (6 days working)

title: UI Developer With Full Stack Engineer
jobDescription:
• We are looking for a skilled and experienced UI Developer with Full Stack Development capabilities to join our team
  • As a UI Developer, you will be responsible for creating visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces, while also contributing to the overall development and architecture of our web applications
  • If you have a strong background in Angular, Ionic, SASS, CSS, RxJS, and state-management frameworks like Elf, NgRx, or Akita, we would love to hear from you
Responsibilities:
  • Develop user interfaces for web applications using Angular and Ionic, ensuring a seamless and visually appealing user experience
  • Collaborate with designers, product managers, and other developers to translate design concepts into functional user interfaces
  • Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code following best practices and coding standards
  • Utilize SASS and CSS to create responsive and mobile-friendly interfaces
  • Implement and utilize RxJS for reactive programming and event handling
  • Integrate state-management frameworks such as Elf, NgRx, or Akita to manage application state
  • Work with API development and C# when required for backend integration and data retrieval
  • Perform thorough testing and debugging of UI components to identify and resolve any issues or bugs
  • Use Git for version control and Azure DevOps for project management and collaboration
  • Stay up-to-date with the latest UI/UX trends, technologies, and best practices, and apply them to enhance the overall user experience
Requirements:
  • Minimum of 3 years of experience in UI Development using Angular, preferably demonstrated through previous projects or work experience
  • Strong proficiency in the Ionic framework for developing mobile applications
  • Previous experience with SASS and CSS for styling and layout design
  • Proficiency in RxJS for reactive programming and event handling
  • Experience with state-management frameworks such as Elf, NgRx, or Akita
  • Familiarity with API development and knowledge of C# is a plus
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills for effective collaboration and documentation
  • Familiarity with Git for source control and Azure DevOps for project management and collaboration
  • If you are a talented UI Developer with Full Stack Development skills, including expertise in Angular, Ionic, SASS, CSS, RxJS, and state-management frameworks, we would like to hear from you
  • Please submit your resume, along with any relevant project references or portfolio showcasing your work
  • Good communication skills, familiarity with Git, and experience with Azure DevOps are also important for this role

title: Kotak Mahindra Bank | Phone Banking Officer / CCE- Voice | On Roll Job
tagsAndSkills: customer care executive,retail banking,cce,assistant manager,officer,back office,banking operations,cross sales
jobDescription:
Urgent hiring for Kotak Mahindra Bank Limited. For the Post of Phone Banking officer (PBO) For Thane-(West) Location.


=> This is permanent job on roles of the Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd. with fixed salary + high incentives.

=> Be part of fastest growing digital sales channel in financial services industry.

=> This will be permanently working from office only (Not a Work From Home).


=================================================================================


Job Designation: Phone Banking Officer

Job Grade: Assistant Manager-M1 / Deputy Manager-M2
Job Locations: Thane-West (Maharashtra)

This is "Contact Centre Branch" (Non-Branch Banking) based Job,

Completely In-house / Office-based profile.


Must be Experience:

# Must be having at least 6 Month experience into any kind of Customer Service with Voice/Calling with BPO, IT, Banking, BFSI & any other industry can also apply.

# Must have a Good Communication skills.



Job Description:

  • Must be excellent communication skills Verbal & Written.
  • Good listening skills and strong communication abilities.
  • Flexible to get scattered 8 Week Offs in a month with 9 hours with late evening and night shifts.
  • To Attend the inbound calls of customers in Retail Liabilities and process the queries & requests to customer's satisfaction.
  • To identify and convert the opportunities for cross selling (banking product) on customer's call.
  • Responsible for quality communication and customer servicing within laid down productivity and service benchmarks.
  • Ensure customer delight and consistent service experience, including timely resolution of customer queries/issues.
  • Complete the logs specified by the process (End-of-day target).
  • Adherence to Information Security norms & quality process norms.
  • To be aware of and comply with any updates about the process.
  • Act on the feedback given by Team Leader/Team Coach or Quality or on the coaching provided to the team as guidelines for improving performance.

Shifts Timings & Offs:

=> Shift Timing- This is 24x7 based rotational shift, Should be comfortable to work in night shift also.

=> Weekly 5 days of working and any of 9 Hours Shifts can be offered.
=> For Females: Any of 9 Hours Shifts can be offered from 7.00 AM to 8.00 PM. (No Night Shift).
=> Two Weekly offs Two rotational weeks off (You may need to work on Sundays and Holidays as well).


Candidate Desire Profile:

  • Must be excellent communication skills Verbal & Written.
  • Good listening skills and strong communication abilities.
  • Flexible to get scattered 8 Week Offs in a month with 9 hours with late evening and night shifts.
  • Age should be 20-30 years only.
  • Be Confident and willing to learn with a flair for knowledge. Possess an upbeat, positive can-do attitude & works with integrity.
  • Team Player, collaborative Self-motivated person including the ability to act as a role model within the organization. Should be able to establish rapport quickly with peers, managers & customers.
  • Team player Candidate must be able to work effectively with all levels of the organization.

Salary Package:

  • Annual CTC of Rs.2.75 to 3.50 Lac per annum plus performance based high Incentives.
  • Plus PF, Gratuity and Mediclaim & Insurance cover (as per policy).

Education Qualification:

  • Minimum Graduate with any stream Or
  • Post Graduate with any stream.



How To Apply:

=> Interested candidates need to apply via Naukri.com by clicking apply link on same the page

or

Need to share updated CV's/Resumes at: hr.empowerdesk@gmail.com | And write in the subject line "Kotak-PBO-1278"

or

=> Also can share updated CVs / Resumes via WhatsApp on: +91-96438-53808 (Write in the subject line "Kotak-PBO-1278"

if your CV / profile got shortlisted with us we will contact you back.


For Any kind of assistance or query call us:

Between 10.00 am to 6.00 pm only (do not call beyond the timings) Mobile Number +91- 9643853808.
